item.title: INTERGROUP CORP 10-K
item.description: INTERGROUP CORP, which is in the Operators Of Apartment Buildings [6513] industry, SEC 10-K filing on September 17, 2021 had 32585 (cleaned) words - 600 were utilized for the visualizations. Top Words: 000 - 1177 instances company - 557 instances 2021 - 349 instances june - 343 instances 30 - 336 instances See the parsed data used in the visualization here. View the actual filing on the SEC website here
